## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_COLOUR\_FULL\_BLOCK property

Whether or not the colour field should display its colour value on the entire block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
FIELD_COLOUR_FULL_BLOCK: boolean;
```
